title: Wraith
description: Mayhem made me a delinquent.Gomorrah made me a monster.I'm an Unholy. An enforcer for Pennsylvania's most feared gang. Trust me when I tell you I'm the last person you want to be locked in a cage with. David Crane saw the damage I can do, and that's the reason he added me to his stable of captive fighters.I understand why Jamie Ellis married Crane. And if it weren't for her, I'd be dead. Problem is, now that Jamie is back in my life, I have no intention of letting her slip away twice.
author: Renee Rocco
